place_of_publication.publication_title: in J. D. Hooker, Fl. Brit. India

TaxonIdentification.variety_name: 短叶亮绿薹草 duan ye liang lü tai cao

treatment.description: Culms 25–35 cm tall. Leaves much shorter than culm. Male spike 1–2.5 cm; female spikes 2–4(–5) cm. Utricles ca. 5 mm.
treatment.distribution: Grasslands at watersides, roadsides; 2000–3000 m. Yunnan [Bhutan, India, Nepal].
